attributes.action: Help the country and the unemployed by re/training them to build/install green energy saving systems, solar panels, underground heating systems in every council building where possible and even wind generators on top of skyscrapers etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole UK should build its way out of this slump and build on our green engineering skills, I would also suggest the people being reskilled gets extra money and not just an extra £10 per week.
